  2. Elon Musk says AI will create 'universal high income' and eliminate the need for jobs  BGR
  3. Elon Musk Became Real-Life Friends With A Young Indian Superfan He Met Through Social Media Says Musk Is 'Humble' And 'Way Down-To-Earth'  Yahoo Finance
